description: High confidence that the estimate of effect lies close to the true effect
requirements: {"Systematic review of RCTs","Large sample size","Low risk of bias","Consistent results"}

description: Moderate confidence in the effect estimate
requirements: {"RCTs with limitations","Observational studies with strong associations","Moderate sample size"}

description: Limited confidence in the effect estimate
requirements: {"Observational studies","Case-control studies","Small sample size","Some risk of bias"}

description: Very limited confidence in the effect estimate
requirements: {"Case series","Expert opinion","High risk of bias","Inconsistent results"}

description: Based on clinical experience and expert consensus
